Experience Excellence
Main Title
WHY US
MIAMI VIBE
Subtitle
Where culinary artistry meets Miami's vibrant spirit
Description
Born from a passion for exceptional cuisine and unforgettable experiences, Sola represents the perfect
 fusion of innovative gastronomy and Miami's dynamic cultural landscape. Every dish tells a story of creativity and excellence.
Decorative Element
Scroll Indicator
Background Effects
Header
Experience Excellence
Discover what sets Sola Miami apart from the rest
Hero Video Section
Where Miami Comes Alive
Born from a passion for refined cuisine and curated experiences, Sola Miami Restaurant + Bar is where
 Latin fusion flavors meet the vibrant rhythm of South Beach. Nestled just steps from Ocean Drive, Sola
 blends innovative gastronomy, handcrafted cocktails, and live entertainment into a truly immersive
 dining experience in Miami Beach.
Whether you're enjoying our signature dishes, sipping bottomless mimosas during brunch, or taking in a
 live performance under the stars, Sola invites you to celebrate flavor, culture, and connection‚Äîright
 in the heart of Miami.
Why Choose Sola
Timeline Line
Timeline Items
üçΩÔ∏è
Culinary Excellence with a Latin Soul
Led by Chef Juan Onate, our kitchen blends the bold essence of New American cuisine with the
 vibrant traditions of Latin fusion. Every dish is crafted with intention‚Äîhighlighting local
 ingredients, rich flavors, and cultural depth.
From our Grilled Salmon finished with Lobster Cream to the beloved Cuban Sampler, each plate tells
 a story of flavor, innovation, and heritage.
üëâ Explore our full menu of Food & Drinks
üéâ
The Vibe: More Than Dining‚ÄîIt's an Experience
At Sola, every hour brings something to celebrate. Our curated events are the heartbeat of our
 space:
Weekend Brunch Parties:
Sip bottomless mimosas, move to live DJ sets, and soak
 in the South Beach sun on our lush outdoor patio.
Dinner & Show:
From Thursday to Sunday, indulge in a gourmet meal with dazzling
 live performances under the stars.
Happy Hour:
Unwind weekdays from 4‚Äì7 p.m. with 2-for-1 handcrafted cocktails
 and frozen drinks.
DJ Sessions:
Daily | 12:00 PM ‚Äì 4:00 PM and 8:00 PM ‚Äì 11:00 PM
üçπ
Signature Drinks & Craft Cocktails
Our full-service bar serves up more than just cocktails‚Äîit delivers refreshment with personality.
 Enjoy bottomless sangrias, creative craft drinks, and artisanal beverages that elevate the mood
 from laid-back to lively.
ü•Ç
Private Events & Unforgettable Moments
Planning a special celebration? From rooftop lounges to intimate indoor settings, Sola offers
 versatile event spaces and personalized service. Whether it's a birthday, brand launch, or
 corporate gathering, we bring your event to life‚Äîwith flavor, flair, and flow.
üëâ Reserve Your Private Event Space
Event Images
Event Images - Second Set
Final CTA
Come for the food. Stay for the vibe.
Sola isn't just a restaurant‚Äîit's where Miami comes alive. Experience the perfect blend of exceptional
 cuisine, vibrant entertainment, and unforgettable moments.
Reserve Now

Dinner & Show
Experience a captivating "Dinner and Show" night at Sola Miami Beach. Indulge in our gourmet cuisine
